# Overview

Setup the basic components of a development environment for the programming language, javascript/typescript.

## Instructions
### Install nvm
Skip node if you use nvm.

```bash
curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.40.3/install.sh | bash
# confirm node -v
```
### Download node
Use package manager.
```bash
sudo apt update
sudo apt install -y nodejs npm
```

Download from the [nodejs](https://nodejs.org/en/download) website.
```{bash}
# If you previously installed into the home directory
# Remember to adjust the version as well.
rm -rf ~/node-v22.5.1-linux-x64/
#sudo rm /usr/local/bin/quarto
# Modify this directory with NODE_VERSION to have multiple installed.
INSTALLATION_DIRECTORY="$HOME/.local/share/node/"
NODE_VERSION="22.17.0"
mkdir -p "${INSTALLATION_DIRECTORY}"
# x86_64 does not exist
sudo curl -o node.tar.gz -L "https://nodejs.org/dist/v${NODE_VERSION}/node-v${NODE_VERSION}.tar.gz"
sudo tar -xzvf node.tar.gz -C "$INSTALLATION_DIRECTORY"

${INSTALLATION_DIRECTORY}/bin/npm --version # Reverify this line depending on how it extracted
sudo ln -s ${INSTALLATION_DIRECTORY}/bin/npm /usr/local/bin/npm
sudo ln -s ${INSTALLATION_DIRECTORY}/bin/node /usr/local/bin/node

# Clean up
rm node.tar.gz
```

### Download deno

```{bash}
curl -fsSL https://deno.land/install.sh | sh
```
